description.hltext_display: Неизвестная Франция глазами депутата
description.content:
В изомузее открылась выставка фаянса мастера конца XIX века Эмиля Галле.
Изысканные вазы, роскошные часы, подсвечники, жардиньерки, созданные известным французским керамистом, можно увидеть рядом с тонкими работами школы Нанси. Вся эта хрупкая красота, привезенная в Казань, - из частных собраний московских коллекционеров. Многие уникальные вещи представлены зрителям впервые. Одним из организаторов выставки стал председатель Комитета по международным делам Госдумы, член Всемирной ассоциации национальных олимпийских комитетов Александр Козловский. В минувшее воскресенье он всего на несколько часов приезжал в Казань, чтобы посмотреть выставку и пополнить ее несколькими экземплярами из своей коллекции.
- С Казанью у нас давний роман, - признался Александр Александрович. - Несколько лет назад в Париже я случайно наткнулся на альбом гравюр с зарисовками танцующего Рудольфа Нуриева - и не удержался, купил. Знаю, в Казани проходит Нуриевский фестиваль, поэтому решил, что подарю этот альбом городу. Прямо из магазина звоню Председателю Госсовета Татарстана Фариду Мухаметшину, с которым мы хорошо знакомы, говорю, что нашел такой альбом и с радостью передам его республике. Фарид Хайруллович спрашивает: «А ты знаешь, сколько сейчас времени? Уже час ночи!» А я совсем забыл о четырехчасовой разнице во времени между Парижем и Казанью... Потом в изомузее была организована выставка индонезийского искусства из коллекции нашей семьи. Здесь мы встретили такое теплое и бережное отношение к экспонатам, что с удовольствием продолжили сотрудничество. Затем появилась идея этой выставки.
- Не сложно ли вам расставаться с предметами из вашей коллекции даже на время?
- Нет, мы с женой с радостью показываем их, потому что понимаем - в музее их увидит огромное количество посетителей. Обычно бывает так: приобретаешь одну вещь, ставишь дома на самое видное место. Потом появляется другая, ту отодвигаешь в сторону, убираешь под кровать, под диван... А в музее этими произведениями искусства могут любоваться люди. Я даже не представлял, что в музейных залах каждая вещь смотрится совершенно по-новому.
Тэги: выставки, Франция, Александр Козловский

description.hltext_display: [더우먼동아 스타 패션] 스타일 UP! 패셔니스타 3인의 개성만점 퍼 부츠 코디법
遼寧風流女貪官判死 包養男下屬貪污600......
description.content:
被稱為「土地奶奶」的遼寧省撫順巿國土資源局順城分局前局長羅亞平，被控貪污斂財6,000萬元人民幣，周一（20日）在瀋陽市中級法院被判受賄、貪污、巨額財產來源不明等罪名成立，一審判處死刑。內地傳媒形容，她是近年「（官階）級別最低、貪污數額最大、手段最惡劣的」女貪官，私生活上更十分風流，曾強搶別人丈夫和包養年輕男下屬等。
本報綜合報道
用職務便利私吞徵地款
法院審理查明，羅亞平從2001年至07年期間，利用掌管黃金地段土地徵用和審批權的職務便利，截留、私吞徵地款。她通常讓前來繳款的單位拿兩張支票，一張交給土地經管中心，一張拿到銀行兌換成現金裝入自己的腰包。另外，她還直接製作假的動遷手續貪污，先用房主的名義製作假的動遷手續，騙來動遷款給房主，其後直接變更為自己佔有。
據悉，羅亞平「落馬」被查後，辦案人員共發現她保存他人身份證12個、戶口本15個，還發現他人身份證複印件23個，以及區土地經管中心大量空白收據、私刻的順城區人民政府公章以及順城區區長的印鑒。在大連市某銀行搜尋到的她名下個人保險箱，裏面各種保單、存摺以及現金共計5,518萬元，其中包括兩張600萬元的保單。
狂甩100萬元搶別人丈夫
此前內地傳媒報道，這位女貪官的風流也讓人咋舌。她勾引上比她小十多歲的男下屬後，為避免男下屬妻子糾纏，居然狂甩100萬元大鈔，讓這個小情人招之則來，揮之則去，隨時滿足自己的淫慾。她看上男上司帥哥後，將其騙到賓館，直接塞給其裝有5萬元的信封。當即哄得男上級寬衣解帶，與其淫樂。
羅亞平先後換過三個丈夫，第一任丈夫與她維持了五年的婚姻，當年留下一個兩歲多的女兒；第二任丈夫是曾擔任過順城區國土局「一把手」的桂思本，認為她工作很熱情，人也很聰明；第三任丈夫是一名加拿大籍華人，準備幫她移居加拿大，但不久她即東窗事發。

description.hltext_display: [더우먼동아 뷰티 아이템] 손끝까지 완벽하게! 연말 파티에 어울리는 네일 컬러 선택법 & 2010 홀리데이 신상 네일 컬렉션 5
description.content: 연말 파티를 위한 메이크업과 헤어, 패션 코드를 완벽하게 끝냈다면 마지막으로 네일 컬러를 잊지 말아야 한다. 친구들과의 파티에서는 네일 컬러가 너무 튀면 경박해 보일 수 있지만 손톱 관리를 하지 않은 듯 보이는 컬러도 피해야할 요소다. 손톱이 길어 보이게 하는 브론즈 계열이나 가벼운 펄감이 느껴지는 컬러가 제격. 입술과 컬러를 맞춰 연출하는 것도 세련된 네일 컬러를 고르는 팁이다. 가족이 모이는 파티 장소라면 보기에는 선명해도 발색이 여린 컬러를 선택하는 것이 무난하다. 손톱을 뾰족하게 다듬기보다는 손톱 모양을 반달형으로 라운드 처리하는 형태가 더 깔끔하다.파티에 제격! 2010 홀리데이 신상 네일 컬렉션 5

description.hltext_display: Lincoln County finalizes 2011 budget, levy
description.content:
IVANHOE - After a hard year of budget cuts, Lincoln County commissioners voted on Tuesday to set their final levy and budget for 2011.
Deep cuts in funding from the state put Lincoln County commissioners in a tight spot when they began planning their budget for 2011. The State cut county program aid in Lincoln County by 72 percent while at the same time slicing into the county's revenue from a wind energy tax generated by wind towers along Buffalo Ridge.
During the last few months, department heads across the county tightened their budgets leading up to the levy meeting Tuesday. Original estimated placed the levy increase as high as 15 percent, but commissioners worked hard during the last few weeks to bring that number under 10 percent.
Commissioners Tuesday agreed to take and additional $125,000 from reserve funds to bring the final levy down to 5.93 percent. Commissioners said that dipping into reservers would help alleviate a further tax burden on citizens and, with any luck, they would be able to put money back into reserves at a later date.
"Hopefully we'll put some back in at the end of the year," commissioner Curtis Blumeyer said. "We're down to basic services and we're not spending out of line."
Chairman Adam Gillund said that in 2010 they decreased the levy by 5.86 percent, so the increase for 2011 is only about a .07 percent increase in the levy over the last two years. With the levy in place, the final budget for the county, totaling $9,734,327, was passed by the board.
Employee salary increases proved to be a hot issue during budget discussions. Commissioner Joan Jagt pointed out that commissioners in Lincoln County were paid far less than any other commissioner in Minnesota. In 2010, commissioners in Lincoln County were paid $12,525 to be on the board and an additional $75 stipend per committee meeting attended during the month. Jagt noted that the average meeting paradigm in Minnesota counties was $80 and, in other predominantly rural counties, commissioners get paid as high as $26,000. Following discussion, commissioners agreed to a $475 yearly raise to bring their annual salary to $13,000. It passed with a 4-1 vote with Gillund being the dissenting vote.
"We haven't taken a raise in a long time," Blumeyer said, voting in favor of the motion.
Commissioners also granted raises to non-union elected employees in the county. A total of eight elected employees received a $1,000 a year salary increase. County highway engineer Lee Amundson, who oversees the largest department and whose department receives the majority of the county budget, was granted a $2,000 increase in salary.

description.hltext_display: Social Media Meets Action Sports With the World Debut of Sponsorme.com Featuring The $100,000 Signature Series - The Premier Online Action Sports Competition.
description.content:
ORANGE COUNTY, Calif., Dec. 21, 2010 /PRNewswire/ -- Sponsor Me is kicking off its website launch by giving away the chance to win $100,000 of cold hard cash in the Sponsor Me $100,000 Signature Series. The Signature Series is an online competition geared at discovering the next great Action Sports Star from the disciplines Sponsorme.com is dedicated to – Surf, Skate, Snow, BMX, Motocross and Wakeboarding. Participants can go to the site to register and upload their video submissions. From there, they promote their entries throughout their network of fans and friends encouraging them to vote. The clips with the most votes are then entered into the Final Round where a panel of Action Sports luminaries will pick the winners in each category. Winners receive a prize package made up of cash, gear and an exclusive promotion inside of the Action Sports community.
( Logo: http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20101221/LA21176LOGO)
Legendary surf icon Sunny Garcia said," Sponsorme.com is the home for Action Sports. I can check out the latest surf reports, while watching clips from the latest Moto events."
"The $100,000 Signature Series was conceived to help the next generation of action sports athletes gain the exposure and opportunities necessary to take them to the next level," said Chris Carmichael.
Sponsor Me's highly touted and widely anticipated social media site, Sponsorme.com, is the first of its kind offering full social networking capabilities with content distribution to multiple media devices, computers, smartphones and tablets, including the Apple iPad and iPhone. Targeted at amateurs and professionals, kids and adults alike, Sponsorme.com allows users to meet, connect and socialize on the world's first Action Sports Social Media Network. Sponsorme.com also brings its members the latest news, product reviews, surf, snow and trail conditions, live events from around the world, as well as, the opportunity to shop for the best gear from the leading brands in Action Sports.
The First Round of The $100,000 Signature Series contests kick off on 1-1-11 in Surf, Skate, & Snow, with Final Round Judging to begin in April 2011. The $100,000 Signature Series is open to both professional and amateur athletes and filmmakers. Sponsor Me urges the best talent and filmmakers to submit their video and be part of the biggest online action sports contest in history.
About:
Sponsor Me Inc.
Sponsor Me is the premier action-sports social media group. Sponsor Me is creating a signature contest series for both professional and amateur athletes in the action sports of surfing, skateboarding, snowboarding, motocross, MMA, drifting and others. The contests are supported by live webcasts via the Sponsor Me site and delivered to mobile devices. Sponsor Me competitions will be held regionally, judged by the pros, and the winners will go on to compete on a national level where fans will have the opportunity to vote online and via SMS. The founders of Sponsor Me grew up competing and participating in all areas of action sports, and some continue to compete at a professional level today. For more information please visit www.sponsorme.com
Apple Inc.
Apple Inc., together with subsidiaries, designs, manufactures, and markets personal computers, mobile communication devices, and portable digital music and video players, as well as sells various related software, services, peripherals, and networking solutions. The company sells its products worldwide through its online stores, retail stores, direct sales force, third-party wholesalers, resellers, and value-added resellers. In addition, it sells various third-party Macintosh, iPhone, iPad, and iPod compatible products, including application software, printers, storage devices, speakers, headphones, and various other accessories and peripherals through its online and retail stores, and digital content and applications through the iTunes Store.

伊朗6.5級地震 毁3村殺7人 數百人傷......
description.content:
伊朗發生黎克特制6.5級的地震。到目前為此，地震造成至少七人死亡、數百人受傷，三個村莊被摧毀，期間更有數百人被埋在瓦礫堆中，但救援人員最終將他們成功救出。現時，災區搭起帳篷，讓災民暫住。而食水、藥物等物資亦會陸續送到災區。不過，地震使到山區的農村受到破壞，山路又被毀，救援工作仍然困難重重，估計死傷人數可能會上升。
本報綜合報道
據伊朗當地的傳媒報道，在伊朗時間20日晚上10時12分，伊朗東南部克曼省(Kerman)發生黎克特制6.5級的地震。但根據美國地質研究中心所測得的數據，伊朗當地的地震強度實為黎克特制6.3級。地震的震央位於克曼省的偏遠地區，扎黑丹鎮西南133公里，深度為12.4公里，屬於淺層地震，因此地震對當地造成一定破壞。不過由於該區的人口並不稠密，死傷有限。到目前為此，至少有七人死亡，數百人受傷。而地震後，數百人更一度被埋於瓦礫堆中等待救援。但幸好救援人員迅速趕到，成功將數百名在瓦礫堆中的災民救出。
幸災民及時救出
震央附近的一個小鎮里甘鎮(Rigan)的鎮長巴爾桑(Mohammad Barzang)表示，地震過後，有三條村莊被摧毀，多間房屋被震倒。但幸好當中的居民大都已經被救出。此外，地震亦使到三十多條村莊亦受到嚴重破壞。伊朗當地的官員指，有部分受破壞的村莊位於山區，而在地震過後，通往山區的山路都被毀，而通訊和水電亦已中斷，因此救援工作的難度將會大大提高。
災區當地的災民現時居住在臨時搭建的帳篷中暫住。而食物、清水和藥品等救災物資亦會陸續送到。而截至21日為止，當地已經發生過至少25次餘震，而其中一次更達到黎克特制5級。由於受災的地方位處偏僻，電訊線路亦已中斷，與外界難以聯繫，因此災情並未明朗。而死傷人數亦有可能增加，但相信不會大幅提高。
事實上，伊朗位於地殼斷層線，因此地震頻仍，而且當中多有毀滅性的威力。伊朗歷來破壞力最強的地震發生在七年前。在2003年12月，伊朗的巴姆市(Bam)發生黎克特制6.3地震，與今次的震央位置相距不遠。雖然該次地震的強度和今次的地震相似，但由於人口遠較今次的地區稠密，因此該次地震造成極大破壞，共有近三萬一千人死亡。
另外，香港天文台於昨晚上10時13分錄得蘇門答臘北部西面離岸海域一次強烈地震，震級為黎克特制5.9級。震中位於北緯2.7度，東經95.8度，即班達亞齊之南約310公里。

description.hltext_display: Pasukan "Merah Putih" Kebal Laser
description.content:
Irfan Bachdim (kanan) dan Cristian Gonzales, saat latihan ringan timnas Indonesia menjelang semifinal leg kedua Piala AFF di Kompleks Stadion Utama Gelora Bung Karno, Jumat (17/12/2010). Gonzales tetap akan dimainkan meskipun dia sudah mengantongi satu kartu kuning saat leg pertama.
TERKAIT
JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Saat bertandang ke Malaysia pada babak final pertama Piala AFF 2010, Minggu (26/12/2010), tim nasional Indonesia bisa jadi bakal mendapatkan intimidasi dalam bentuk apapun termasuk teror sinar laser dari pendukung tuan rumah. Namun, pelatih timnas Indonesia, Alfred Riedl, menegaskan hal itu tidak akan mempengaruhi anak asuhnya pada pertandingan nanti.
Saya melihat adanya sinar laser dalam beberapa pertandingan. Namun hal itu tidak akan terlalu berpengaruh bagi tim kami.
Teror laser pernah dilakukan pendukung "Harimau Malaysia" saat menjamu Vietnam pada semifinal pertama beberapa waktu lalu. Dalam tayangan televisi, kerap terlihat wajah pemain Vietnam ditembak sinar laser. Pelatih Vietnam, Henrique Calisto, menuding, teror yang dilakukan pendukung Malaysia menjadi penyebab timnya kalah 0-2.
Pendukung Malaysia bukan tidak mungkin akan melakukan hal serupa ketika Firman Utina dan kawan-kawan tampil di Stadion Bukit Jalil pada pertandingan nanti. Ketua Umum PSSI, Nurdin Halid, bahkan telah menginstruksikan timnas untuk tidak melanjutkan pertandingan bila ditemui adanya teror laser pada laga nanti.
Riedl justru menilai hal itu bukan sebagai ancaman bagi timnya. Namun bila tindakan tidak sportif itu terjadi pada pertandingan nanti, Riedl tidak bisa merinci apakah akan melanjutkan pertandingan atau tidak. "Ya, saya melihat adanya sinar laser dalam beberapa pertandingan. Namun hal itu tidak akan terlalu berpengaruh bagi tim kami," tukasnya.

description.hltext_display: Demand in Men’s Jewelry Rises and Retailer, Emitations.com, Jumps on...
description.content:
Emitations.com has expanded its jewelry collection to include men’s solitaire earrings. The online sterling silver retailer now offers single, silver fake diamond studs, gold fake diamond studs and solitaire gold hoops.
More men are now wearing earrings to show off their personal style. Due to the increasing popularity, there is a much larger selection than in the past. Men have the option of buying a classic faux diamond stud, all the way to a trendy CZ studded gold hoop.
Department stores and e-tailers have recognized the opportunity in the men's fashion market. Gilt Groupe will launch Gilt Man, an e-commerce site dedicated to men’s fashion and accessories in the Summer of 2011. JCPenney has already expanded their fashion apparel collections to include big and tall men.
“The market for men’s fashion jewelry has grown. For example we have received requests from men wanting stud solitaire earrings,” said Au-Co Mai, the Founder and CEO of Emitations.com. “They wanted classy, real looking studs for everyday use. We took this information and created a terrific men’s jewelry collection that has really helped generate new customers.”
Emitations.com allows men to buy earrings as a pair or individually. Men have the option of purchasing a pair of faux diamond studs, or they can shop for single stud earrings for a different look. The men’s earrings selection comes in a wide variety of stone cut, color and carat size. Most men prefer the solitaire stud style, with the 2 carat round cut faux diamond stud garnering the highest ranking among the male demographic. Emitations.com’s most popular men stud earrings are the 2 carat black faux diamond earrings and the 4 carat fake diamond magnetic stud earrings.
The online retailer also offers options for men who are looking for a non-permanent solution to this jewelry trend. Clip on earrings, screw back earrings and magnetic earrings are great alternatives to men without pierced ears. These options are great ways to transition men into wearing jewelry. The non-pierced varieties can help ease them into this stylish accessory.
Since 1998, Emitations.com has been the leader in bringing celebrity style to the everyday woman by using cubic zirconia and sterling silver. Emitations.com is a popular resource for celebrity and fashion media, with sterling silver jewelry frequently appearing on The View, The Today Show, and in magazines such as InStyle, O! Magazine and Glamour.

description.hltext_display: Lyon County landfill lawsuit dismissed
description.content:
A lawsuit brought by a pair of Lyon County taxpayers against the county, alleging mismanagement at the county landfill, has been dismissed by a district court judge.
A ruling filed by judge Michelle Dietrich on Friday granted a motion by Lyon County's attorneys to dismiss the complaint against the county. Some of the allegations in the complaint were not timely, while others failed for lack of standing and for lack of a cause for the court to act, the ruling said.
The complaint was originally brought in Ramsey County, but a transfer to Lyon County was ordered in April. The lawsuit came before Lyon County District Court during a motion hearing in late September, and had been under advisement by Dietrich since then.
The lawsuit was brought against the county in March, by a non-profit group called the Alliance of Taxpayers Against Corruption, and taxpayers Elaine Snyder and Donald DeLanghe. The complaint in the case made several allegations about the Lyon County sanitary landfill, including that the landfill was not collecting Minnesota sales tax on loads of solid waste, that waste haulers were dumping trash without supervision or paying fees, and that the landfill posed environmental dangers to wetlands and groundwater. In an answer to the complaint, Lyon County denied all allegations.
Dietrich's ruling said that the complaint's environmental allegations made under the Minnesota Environmental Policy Act failed because they were not filed in a timely manner. Some of the allegations involved a phase of the landfill that received MPCA approval in January, and the plaintiffs would have had 30 days after that to file a complaint, the ruling said. Instead, the complaint was filed in March.
The ruling said other allegations did not have standing in court, because they failed to provide an illegal act, like unlawful use of public funds or illegal actions by public officials, on which the court could rule. Failing to collect revenue was not the same thing as unlawfully spending public money, the ruling said. The ruling also said the allegations did not provide a cause of action to support the taxpayer group's claims in court.

description.hltext_display: � εριμένει μετεγγραφές ο Χιμένεθ
Riedl: Malaysia Bukan Tim Pecundang
description.content:
Para pemain Malaysia bergembira merayakan kemenangan 5-1 atas Laos yang memastikan mereka lolos ke semifinal Piala AFF.
TERKAIT
JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Pelatih tim nasional Indonesia Alfred Riedl menilai, bukan perkara mudah bagi timnya untuk kembali menaklukan Malaysia saat kedua tim bertemu pada final pertama Piala AFF 2010, Minggu (26/12/2010). Namun, tim Merah Putih bertekad akan berupaya semaksimal mungkin untuk membawa pulang kemenangan pada pertandingan nanti.
"Harimau Malaya" memang pernah dipecundangi 1-5 oleh Firman Utina dan kawan-kawan di laga perdana babak penyisihan grup A. Akan tetapi, Malaysia mampu bangkit dari keterpurukan dan sukses melangkah ke final setelah menyingkirkan Vietnam dengan agregat 2-0.
"Saya pikir tidak akan mudah bagi kita untuk mengalahkan mereka bila mereka tampil seperti mengalahkan Vietnam. Namun kami akan berusaha maksimal," jelas Riedl seusai memimpin sesi latihan tim, Rabu (22/12/2010) pagi.
Menurut Riedl, Malaysia merupakan tim yang sudah jauh berkembang dan lebih tangguh ketimbang pada babak penyisihan lalu. "Mereka sudah berkembang. Mereka berbeda saat kami mengalahkan mereka 5-1. Menghadapi Vietnam, mereka telah mengganti tiga pemainya dan mereka lebih baik saat ini," tukas mantan pelatih Laos itu.
Malaysia memang memasukkan tiga pemain baru di dalam skuadnya. Mereka adalah Amar Bin Rohidan, Mahalli Bin Jasuli, dan kiper Khairul Fahmi Bin Che Mat. Ketiga pemain ini tidak bisa dipungkiri memiliki andil besar saat mengalakan Vietnam.

description.hltext_display: Reinvented 2011 Ford Explorer Earns IIHS Top Safety Pick; Delivers Suite of Standard Safety Features
description.content:
DEARBORN, Mich., Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ --
All-new 2011 Ford Explorer earns Insurance Institute for Highway Safety Top Safety Pick, adding to Ford's leading number of top safety ratings
The reinvented Explorer offers a class-leading array of airbags, including industry-exclusive inflatable second-row seat belts, Safety Canopy® side curtains, Trinity front crash architecture and collision warning with brake support
Explorer also features AdvanceTrac® with RSC® (Roll Stability Control) with Curve Control, and MyKey® teen-safety technology all class-exclusive innovations to help drivers reduce the risk of accidents on the roadExplorer's innovative driver-aid technologies such as BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert and rear view camera are proving popular with buyers
The reinvented 2011 Ford Explorer, which offers a suite of innovative safety technologies, is the latest Ford vehicle to earn a Top Safety Pick rating from the Insurance Institute for Highway Safety.
Ford now has eight vehicles on the road in the U.S. that have earned Top Safety Picks, which adds to Ford's leading number of top U.S. safety ratings ever. "The Ford Explorer sets a new standard for high-tech safety innovation," said Sue Cischke, Ford group vice president of Sustainability, Environment and Safety Engineering. "The Explorer offers several new innovative technologies, including available industry-first production rear inflatable seat belts, and Curve Control, which can help drivers maintain control of a vehicle if they enter a curve too quickly." To earn a Top Safety Pick, a vehicle must receive a rating of "good" in offset frontal-, side- and rear-impact crash tests and roof strength evaluations, as well as offer electronic stability control.
Initial demand for the driver-aid technologies on the new 2011 Explorer has been strong. Of the first 19,000 orders received:
22 percent include adaptive cruise control with forward collision warning, active park assist and rain-sensing wipers 40 percent include BLIS® (Blind Spot Information System) with cross-traffic alert 87 percent include rear view camera "Explorer has a history of safety innovation, from side-curtain airbags to AdvanceTrac® with RSC® (Roll Stability Control), and now offering the world's first production rear inflatable seat belts," said Craig Patterson, Explorer marketing manager. "Explorer customers value safety and security. Safety features are one of the top reasons customers cite for their purchases of Explorer and SUVs in general." World's first production inflatable rear seat belts
The new Ford inflatable rear seat belts spread impact forces across five times more area than conventional seat belts to reduce pressure on the chest while helping to control head and neck motion. The auto industry's first-ever production inflatable seat belts are designed to provide additional protection for rear-seat occupants, often children and older passengers who can be more vulnerable to head, chest and neck injuries. Explorer's Curve Control Ford is pioneering the next frontier of safety with crash-avoidance innovations such as Curve Control, designed to help drivers maintain control of their vehicle when taking a curve too quickly, a situation found to contribute to approximately 50,000 crashes on curves each year in the U.S. alone.
Curve Control senses when a vehicle is entering a curve too quickly, and can apply four-wheel smart braking to reduce vehicle speed by up to 10 mph in approximately one second and help drivers follow their intended path.
Additional driver-assist and safety features "The new Explorer delivers features that both help prevent a crash and help minimize occupant injuries when a crash is unavoidable," said Erika Low, Explorer safety manager. "It's a comprehensive safety story from bumper to bumper." The new Explorer comes equipped with technologies to help prevent crashes from parking lot fender benders to high-speed collisions by warning drivers of the potential for a crash. Driver- aid and safety technologies include options such as:
Adaptive cruise control, which slows the vehicle to adapt for traffic conditions and maintain a preset distance between vehicles Collision warning with brake support, which helps reduce speed, automatically pre-charges brakes, provides a red warning light on the windshield as well as an audible beep to help drivers stop more quickly when the system detects a collision is imminentBLIS with cross-traffic alert, which helps detect vehicles in blind spots during normal driving, as well as traffic approaching from the sides when reversing out of parking spots Tire Pressure Monitoring System, which alerts drivers when it senses tire pressure is lowMyKey, which allows parents to limit speed and audio volume in their vehicles and is designed to help parents encourage safe driving habits in their teens
Structural safety and crash protection
Explorer features a unibody configuration body structure with nearly half of the stiff shell comprised of high-strength steels, such as boron. A-pillars, rocker panels and front beams are made out of boron steel for both increased strength and reduced weight. This structure was designed and developed to meet global crash standards.
Explorer features Ford's Trinity front crash structure, so named for its three components designed to absorb and redirect crash forces in the event of an incident.
When a crash becomes unavoidable, Explorer relies on a class-leading array of airbags to protect occupants. Two front and two side second-generation airbags are joined by a Safety Canopy® consisting of side-curtain airbags for all three rows of passengers. Personal Safety System safety belts feature pretensioners and an energy management system with adjustable D-ring height in the first row.
Other Ford vehicles that have earned a Top Safety Pick rating include:
2011 Ford Taurus
2011 Ford Fusion
2011 Ford Fiesta
2011 Ford Flex
2011 Lincoln MKS
2011 Lincoln MKT
2011 Lincoln MKZ
About Ford Motor Company
Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F), a global automotive industry leader based in Dearborn, Mich., manufactures or distributes automobiles across six continents. With about 163,000 employees and about 70 plants worldwide, the company's automotive brands include Ford, Lincoln and Mercury, production of which has been announced by the company to be ending in the fourth quarter of 2010. The company provides financial services through Ford Motor Credit Company. For more information regarding Ford's products, please visit www.ford.com.
SOURCE Ford Motor Company

description.hltext_display: Mosley-Pacquiao fight set f...
description.content:
Manny Pacquiao will defend his WBO welterweight title when he takes on American Shane Mosley in Las Vegas in May.
Mosley is a former holder of the welterweight belt and will be keen to have it wrapped around his waist once again at the MGM Grand on May 7.
The 39-year-old Mosley was thought to be too old to take on Pacquiao after being thrashed by the unbeaten Floyd Mayweather Junior, and held to a draw against Sergio Mora in his past two bouts.
But Mosley beat potential Pacquiao opponents Juan Manuel Marquez and Andre Berto for the chance to fight the world's greatest pound-for-pound boxer (according to The Ring magazine).
Pacquiao's trainer Freddie Roach said he had no intention of taking Mosley lightly, who he believes has primed himself to take on the Filipino.
"I think it's a good fight. I feel that Shane is one of the toughest guys left out there right now," Roach told ESPN.com.
"He didn't get up for 'The Contender' guy (Mora), but he will get up for Manny Pacquiao. It's a difficult fight because Shane has speed and power."
"He's getting a little older, which is in our favour, but I expect Shane to be at his best because he's wanted this fight for a long time. I will get Pacquiao well prepared for this one."
Top Rank promoter Bob Arum, who promotes for Pacquiao, said he and colleague Bruce Trample believe Mosley will be stiff opposition for their champion.
"Bruce Trample says it's a very difficult fight. I believe it will be an exciting fight," Arum told ESPN.com.
"Shane knows how to fight and how to deal with the speed. Manny is in for a hellacious fight. I really believe styles make fights."

description.hltext_display: � ΑΟΚ: Κάποια πράγματα δεν αλλάζουν
Di Sini Baru Malaysia Kita Sikat...
description.content:
Rabu, 22 Desember 2010 | 14:59 WIB
Laporan wartawan KOMPAS.com Caroline Damanik
KOMPAS IMAGES/KRISTIANTO PURNOMO
Suporter Tim Nasional Indonesia merayakan kemenangan usai menundukkan Tim Nasional Filipina pada pertandingan semifinal leg kedua AFF Suzuki Cup 2010 di Stadion Gelora Bung Karno, Jakarta, Minggu (19/12/2010). Indonesia akhirnya melaju ke final Piala AFF setelah menang dengan agregat 2-0 atas Filipina, dan akan melawan Malaysia 26 dan 29 Desember mendatang.
TERKAIT
JAKARTA, KOMPAS.com - Tim nasional Indonesia diharapkan tidak terlalu buka-bukaan terkait strategi permainan di laga final leg pertama melawan Malaysia di Stadion Bukit Jalil Malaysia, 26 Desember mendatang. Ketua DPD RI Irman Gusman berharap timnas cukup bermain seri saja kalaupun tidak bisa mencuri kemenangan dari tuan rumah.
Kalau Indonesia menang ya harus kita syukuri, kalau Malaysia kalah juga kita syukuri.
"Tapi kita tak boleh memberikan beban psikologis juga kepada mereka supaya mereka rileks. Kita kan main dua kali. Kalau di sana, tentu kita berada dalam posisi defensif. Strategi di sana jangan terlalu terbuka juga, kita defensif saja, ini juga strategi kemenangan. Di sini baru kita sikat," katanya di Gedung DPD RI, Rabu (22/12/2010).
Irman menilai pertandingan Piala Suzuki AFF 2010 merupakan momentum yang baik bagi nasionalisme masyarakat saat ini yang selama ini terpuruk. Dia harapkan momentum ini dapat memacu prestasi Indonesia di bidang lain, seperti politik, ekonomi, dan budaya.
"Sehingga kita yakin kalau kita bersama saling mendukung pasti akan kita dapati juga di bidang politik, ekonomi, sehingga menuju masyarakat yang lebih sejahtera, lebih adil," tambahnya.
Sementara itu, Irman juga mengatakan Indonesia harus berjuang keras untuk melawan Malaysia. DPD sendiri akan menggelar nonton bareng dengan layar lebar pada jadwal laga final. "Kalau Indonesia menang ya harus kita syukuri, kalau Malaysia kalah juga kita syukuri," tandasnya.

description.hltext_display: ΟΛΥΜ� ΙΑΚΟΣ � . Επιλέγει με την άνεσή του
生果金制度受挑戰 翁入稟指離港限制違基本......
description.content:
高等法院早前裁定，當局對綜援申請人設居港期限違反《基本法》後，同樣設離境限制的高齡津貼（俗稱生果金）制度昨亦受到挑戰。一名經常返內地探親的72歲長者林和倫，因不滿社署以未有「連續居港一年」為由，拒絕其「生果金」申請，昨在社區組織協會協助下，入稟高院申請司法覆核，認為現行離港限制政策違反《基本法》中，市民有權獲取社會福利的權利及平等原則。
記者陳超銓報道
協助林和倫的香港社區組織協會社區組織幹事吳衞東昨日指出，林伯擔心如果沒有「生果金」，他只能靠積蓄過活，擔心生活有困難。吳續指，到內地居住的65歲以上港人，過去五年有增無減，社署資料顯示，五年以來逾1.2萬名長者不符離港限期，申請「生果金」被拒。
五年1.2萬長者申請被拒
社協認為有關規定違反《基本法》及《人權法》，亦影響港人的出入境自由，要求政府撤消有關限制。自高等法院就綜援設居港期限作出判決後，社協累計有16個類似個案。今次首先將會協助其中一名代表性長者提出司法覆核，挑戰有關限制。
入稟狀透露，原訴人林和倫育有三子一女，林伯過去曾長時間任職司機，包括在中華巴士、大東電報局任司機，退休前在律師樓任職信差。林伯2004年退休後，為節省生活開支，遷到廣東三水居住超過五年，間中回港。他在2008年曾向社署申請生果金，但不獲批准。
其後因內地物價上漲，林伯的積蓄只剩下五萬元，加上健康轉壞，今年4月他回港居住，到社署申領生果金時，職員指他不符合居港規定，要他10個月後再提出申請。他後來聽取社署的建議，留港至今年10月，現已獲批准領取生果金1,000餘元。他認為，現行離港限制政策違反《基本法》中，市民有權獲取社會福利的權利及平等原則。
指市民有權利獲取社福
入稟狀續指，根據社署過去五年的數據，因不符離港限制被拒的生果金申請共有12,316宗，即平均每年約有2,500宗；傷殘津貼方面，五年以來共有1,620宗不符離港限制被拒的申請；至於綜援，自2007年記錄該類申請以來，共有119宗因不符離港限制而未獲批個案。

description.hltext_display: Nu ska drabbade pendlare kompenseras
description.author: Hanna Petersson
description.content:
NorrköpingDå är det mer än tre år sedan EU fattade beslut om att resenärer som har periodkort har rätt till ersättning när tåget inte håller tiden. Det är den regeln Allmänna reklamationsnämnden hänvisar till när de rekommenderar Östgötatrafiken att ge Tiina Mauritzell 650 kronor.
Nya reglerFrån den 10 januari 2011 gäller de nya reglerna inom Östgötatrafiken. Ersätts inte inställda tåg med buss eller taxi och blir förseningen mer än en halvtimme har resenärerna rätt att få en del av pengarna för biljetten tillbaka. Blir förseningen mer än en timme ersätts förmodligen minst hela beloppet.
Det här gäller inte för resor innan en 10 januari.
Tidigare har bara de som löst enstaka biljetter fått ersättning och då maximalt 350 kronor.
- Som jag ser det är det vad vi snarast måste ändra på. Det är en brist att vi inte kunnat kompensera våra stamkunder, säger Paul Håkansson, vd för Östgötatrafiken.
Rimligt krav- Kärnan i Allmänna reklamationsnämndens utlåtande är ju att de som har års- och månadskort också måste kompenseras. Det tycker jag är rimligt. Vi hade infört det här regelverket oavsett Allmänna reklamationsnämndens utlåtande, säger han.
De senaste veckornas kaosartade läge inom Östgötatrafiken har, enligt Östgötatrafikens vd, gjort att man inte längre kan vänta med beslut om ett nytt ersättningssystem. Läs mer Hanna PeterssonPublicerad2010-12-22 02:08

description.hltext_display: Αποκλείστηκε μόνο ο � ΑΟΚ
SMSU loses charter admin., current faculty member
description.content:
The Southwest Minnesota State community lost two long-time past and current faculty members recently when Robert D. Johnson and Winston Gittens died within a few days of each other.
Charter administrator and faculty member Dr. Robert D. Johnson died Monday, Dec. 20, at the Golden Living Center in Battle Lake. His funeral will be at 1 p.m. Thursday at the Trinity Lutheran Church in Moorhead. Visitation is from 5-7 p.m. today at the Wright Funeral Home in Moorhead.
Education professor Dr. Winston Gittens died Friday, Dec. 17, after returning to his home country of Barbados to visit his family. An autopsy will be performed early in January, family members have told SMSU officials, and his funeral will take place later that month.
Johnson began his duties at SMSU in 1967, the year the university opened its doors. He was hired as director of research and institutional grants and associate professor of education. During his time at the university, he wore many hats, including vice president for marketing and development and vice president for public affairs and executive assistant to the president.
Retired English professor Jack Hickerson, who taught at the university for 42 years, knew Johnson as a fellow employee, but became good friends after Johnson left in 1990.
"We invited him to join our hunting and fishing club," Hickerson said. The Thunder Hawk Sportsmen's Club was comprised of SMSU staff and other Marshall residents.
"We would fish in Lake Michigan and Alaska and hunt in North Dakota and South Dakota," Hickerson said. "He would invite us to his cabin, Journey's End, on Leech Lake for the fishing opener and we would start the season there. We did a lot of hunting and fishing and had a lot of fun and Bob was at the center of it. He was a kind and generous man."
Also in the club was retired Marshall City Administrator Duane Aden.
"He was a gentleman from the word go, always generous," Aden said. "We came to Marshall about the same time, our kids were in school together, and we became good friends."
Johnson left the university to join SMSU President Robert Carothers when he became chancellor of what was then the State University System.
"Bob knew just about everyone in southwestern Minnesota," said Carothers, now the University of Rhode Island president. "He introduced me to bankers and farmers, football coaches and artists from Ivanhoe to Jackson to Willmar. He taught me how to see and love the prairie, just as he did. And he loved his new university and watched it grow. To the core, Bob Johnson was a good man."
Johnson was married to Alma Cater, and had four children - three sons and a daughter - from his first marriage.
Memorials are preferred to the SMSU Foundation at Southwest Minnesota State University.
Johnson's death came on the heels of the SMSU community hearing about Gittens' death of an apparent heart attack Dec. 17 at the Grantly Adams International Airport as he was traveling home to Barbados to visit his family.
According to an online story in NationNews.com, a daily newspaper in Barbados, Gittens was traveling to Baird's Village, St. Joseph, where his mother, Celestine, lives.
Gittens came to the United States 15 years ago and was previously at Berea University in Berea, Ky., before coming to SMSU.
"He was someone we all loved dearly and he'll be missed very much," said Rhonda Bonnstetter, the education department chairwoman at SMSU. "He had a real command of the English language. He spoke it better than all of us. He spoke the British English, and the way he wrote was, wow! It was a real shock to us because he was a vegetarian and ate carefully, and he actually used a treadmill as opposed to hanging clothes on it.
"I've been getting e-mails from students, they just loved him and respected him."
Gittens taught both undergraduate and graduate courses in education.
Candace Thomas, a former student of Gittens' now teaching in the Marshall Adult Basic Education program, said Gittens treated students as individuals.
"He reached every single person," she said. "He understood how important that is for a teacher. He had an appreciation for their gifts and what brought them to the classroom. I don't know if I would had stuck with it without him."
Thomas was a non-traditional student with a master's degree who took classes at SMSU to receive her Minnesota teaching licensure.
"He used to tell me I could teach the course," she said. "So many of our students are not well traveled and didn't know what to make of this wonderfully large, kind, gentle man with this beautiful accent. He had this wonderful way of drawing students out. He had a way of celebrating each student and their differences, and encouraged students to think and really learn to put into words what they wanted to say about anything."
A memorial service at the university will take place for Gittens early in the second semester.

description.hltext_display: 小巴安全改革不力 見棺流淚為時便晚
description.content:
申訴專員公署批評運輸署未有盡責改善小巴營運安全，指本港在2000年發生數宗涉及小巴致命交通意外後，運輸署曾承諾推行改革措施，但隨後九年進展甚微，很多時候出現致命意外才稍為跟進。並指署方只要求新小巴須設乘客安全帶，對舊小巴則採取自然淘汰，全無積極措施，罔顧市民生命安全。申訴專員直斥運輸署因循被動，欠缺積極，建議運輸署強制舊小巴加裝安全帶和制訂適當措施。
2000年3月，一輛通宵專線小巴駛至沙田大涌橋路十字路口時發生嚴重車禍，釀成一死十三傷慘劇，警方調查後認為小巴超速行駛，而乘客座位沒有安全帶是增加傷亡的重要原因之一。小巴車禍頻生引起社會關注，運輸署答應推行改革措施，避免小巴意外傷亡。然而，小巴安全改革「只聞樓梯響，不見人下來」。
直到去年6月旺角再有小巴剷上行人路造成二死八傷悲劇，7月元朗公路又發生小巴超速駕駛引發重大車禍，造成四人死亡、十多人受傷，接連發生血淋淋的車禍，令小巴安全問題再次引起社會高度關注，運輸署才加快研究並推行在小巴安裝車速限制器和行車記錄儀，但是有關工作進展十分緩慢。而運輸署花了四年多時間籌備小巴司機強制性職前培訓課程，這種蝸牛速度實在令人無法接受。
如何提高公共小巴安全，社會早有共識，即安裝車速限制器和俗稱「黑盒」的行車記錄儀，並為小巴司機提供培訓。
黑盒可以記錄司機的駕駛行為，行車速度、煞車以至開關車門等資料，任何超速行為都無所遁形，堪稱是超速駕駛的剋星。在公共交通工具安裝黑盒已是國際大趨勢，本港巴士自2006年引入黑盒，至今已有八成以上巴士完成安裝。
小巴早應引入黑盒，以防止司機超速駕駛。本港去年第三季引入一款適用於小巴的黑盒，但整體安裝進度緩慢，運輸署務必加快黑盒的安裝，以便提醒司機安全行車，有效監管車速。
此外，運輸署必須制訂措施，強制所有小巴安裝安全帶。現時全港仍有近四成半舊式小巴，總數達2,100部，乘客座位並沒有安全帶，若按現時自然淘汰的換車進度，需要八年才能徹底換上有安全帶的新式小巴，也是說在這段時間乘客的安全都無法得到保障。因此，運輸署必須主動與業界協商，提出積極方案，限定時間要求所有舊式小巴加裝安全帶。
還有，小巴一天沒有劃一設置安全帶，都容易令乘客混淆是否必要佩戴，這是乘客至今未有養成佩戴安全帶習慣的主要原因。政府應加強宣傳，要求乘搭有安全帶小巴的乘客都要佩戴安全帶，運輸署也須加強巡查，對違例者必須進行執罰，才能保障乘客自身安全。

description.hltext_display: Strumpfuskare stängs av
description.author: TT-AFP
description.content:
Sport Taipei
Internationella taekwondoförbundets hemsida attackerades av hackare som var upprörda efter att taiwanesiskan Yang Shu-chun straffats med avstängning efter att ha haft för många sensorer i strumporna under Asiatiska spelen. Yang diskvalificerades under tävlingarna och stängs nu av i tre månader. Hennes tränare fick 20 månaders avstängning och Taiwans taekwondoförbund får böta motsvarande 341 000 kronor. TT-AFPPublicerad2010-12-22 09:18

description.hltext_display: ΚΥ� ΕΛΛΟ ΕΛΛΑΔΑΣ ΦΑΣΗ «16»
PublicRecordFinder.com Enables Consumers to Reconnect Over the...
description.content:
For many, the Holidays are a magical time made up of family, friends and fond memories and for some, someone near and dear may be missing from their life. The Internet may hold valuable clues to the whereabouts of people who have lost touch with a special person and want to reconnect this holiday season.
Years ago, locating someone required a lot of legwork, some detective skills and a little luck for good measure. Today, there are online tools, sites and services to aide in the process. The key is to get organized, use the right tools and get started sooner rather than later.
It’s important to gather together any and all information about the person. Begin with the basics, such as name, birth date, mother’s maiden name or last known address. If those details are limited, make a list of anyone who might have knowledge about their whereabouts, such as childhood friends, relatives or old neighbors. Each person on the list may hold an important clue to helping you achieve your goal.
Although search engines or social networks may seem like the obvious place to begin, the volume of information you receive can be overwhelming, unproductive and even discouraging. To bypass quantity and go straight to quality, comprehensive data, utilize public records. Public Records are powerful tools that contain vital information and can unlock available home, work and personal data. Many times, using an email address or phone number can produce valuable insight. With the exception of juvenile files, adoptions and financial records, public information is available for anyone to view. There are consumer resource guides that help consumers become aware of what public records can offer. What once required a trip to the city or county clerk’s office is now available at your fingertips from companies that pull this data together, such as PublicRecordFinder (http://www.PublicRecordFinder.com).
For those who may be homeless or do not want to be found, searching could require some serious sleuthing. Since no national database exists for this population, phone skills, patience and ingenuity are important. Check online for a list of shelters, community organizations and churches in the area and track down anyone who may be in contact. Share photographs, create a ‘Missing’ poster or consider an ad in a local paper or website online.
Reconnecting with a special someone could be the best gift possible for the holidays, but it may also present challenges and even disappointment. Today’s online tools make the process easier than ever before, but it still takes time and patience to undergo a search.
About
Public Record Finder is a leading provider of consumer and enterprise services that enable users to search for and find online public records. Publicrecordfinder.com’s Public Records Search provides access for a fee to an instant report that may include phone, date of birth, relatives, address, average home value, marriage/divorce records and more. Its access to more detailed Background Check feature enables users to search individuals to get a complete background summary that includes information from criminal checks, sex offender checks, bankruptcies, contact information, property information and more.
Contact
For more information on PublicRecordFinder.com please contact PRFMediaInquiry(at)gmail.com

description.hltext_display: SYNC AppLink Now Available as Free Download; Ford Fiesta Owners First With Voice Control of Apps
description.content:
DEARBORN, Mich., Dec. 22, 2010 /PRNewswire/ --
SYNC® AppLink, the industry-first software application that gives SYNC users hands-free voice control of their smartphone apps, is now available as a free download for 2011 Ford Fiesta owners at www.syncmyride.com
Ford announces that Apple iPhone will be compatible with AppLink, along with initially announced BlackBerry by RIM and Android-based smartphones
Pandora internet radio, Stitcher news radio and OpenBeak are the first SYNC-enabled mobile apps, some of which can be downloaded today from Android Market and BlackBerry App World, and soon from Apple App Store
SYNC AppLink comes first to 2011 Ford Fiesta owners, with more SYNC-equipped vehicles soon to follow
More than 14,000 owners of SYNC®-equipped Ford Fiesta vehicles can start celebrating the holidays now by treating themselves to the gift of AppLink, a free software program that gives SYNC users voice control of apps stored on their smartphone.
The industry-first capability puts Ford out front in the race to integrate smartphone apps into the car. The AppLink download for Fiesta owners went live today on the SYNC owner website, www.syncmyride.com. "More and more drivers are using their devices and their apps while in the car," said Doug VanDagens, director of Ford Connected Services. "With AppLink, SYNC is a smarter solution for these drivers who choose to use these apps while driving making it the only connectivity system available that can extend app functionality to the car using both voice and steering wheel controls." Ford is also announcing a surprise new member to the AppLink family: the Apple iPhone. The popular smartphone makes for a powerful addition, and will be joining Android and BlackBerry smartphones as compatible devices with the software that allows apps to be controlled through the SYNC voice recognition system a smarter alternative to manually controlling apps while driving.
Recent studies indicate 46 percent of adult smartphone users have apps on their phones and 36 percent of those admit to using those apps while commuting. Moreover, the 2010 study "Staying Connected on the Go: A Look at In-Vehicle Smartphone Integration Systems" conducted by the Consumer Electronics Association reports that 55 percent of smartphone owners prefer voice commands as their user interface for in-car smartphone integration, making the business case for SYNC and AppLink even more compelling. "SYNC and AppLink work hand-in-hand to answer consumer demand for safer, smarter control of smartphones while in the car," said VanDagens. "Ford has worked hard to be a step ahead or at least in step with the speed of the consumer electronics market, and to leverage the technologies, features and services we know our customers want to be connected to while driving." Easy downloading
2011 SYNC-equipped Ford Fiesta owners need to log in to their account on www.syncmyride.com to access the free AppLink download in the Update & Customize section.
As with any typical download, the AppLink software can be stored on a USB memory stick, and then inserted and uploaded to the vehicle via the SYNC system's USB port. In-car installation takes less than 10 minutes.
The first SYNC-enabled apps to market are Pandora internet radio, Stitcher news radio and OpenBeak for listening to Twitter posts. Once the AppLink upload is complete, customers can then visit their phones' respective app store to download the latest SYNC-enabled Pandora, Stitcher or OpenBeak app to their smartphone as they would any other app.
Current availability of SYNC-enabled apps:
PandoraApple iPhone: Coming early 2011Android: Available now (V1.5.3 or higher)BlackBerry: Available now (Version 1.1.6 or higher)StitcherApple iPhone: Coming early 2011Android: Coming early 2011BlackBerry: Late availabilityOpenBeakBlackBerry: Available now from http://m.openbeak.com and soon in Blackberry App World (Version 1.4 or higher)
Seamless voice control
AppLink makes the connection between app and SYNC fairly seamless and simple, using Bluetooth streaming on paired Android and BlackBerry smartphones and the USB port for a connected Apple iPhone.
To access a mobile app with a SYNC-paired phone, the user simply has to press the VOICE button on the steering wheel and say the command, "Mobile applications," followed by the name of the app he or she would like to launch.
Once linked to Pandora, SYNC users can access their favorite personalized radio features, including creating and choosing stations, bookmarking songs for purchase, and giving songs a thumbs up/down all through voice. Command structure is intuitive and simple: "Play station classic rock radio," "Bookmark song," "Thumbs up" or "Thumbs down." "Where before users would pick up their phone, taking their eyes off the road and hands off the steering wheel while driving to select a station and hit play, AppLink makes all of that functionality available through voice control, just like managing AM and FM radio or your MP3 player through SYNC," said Julius Marchwicki, SYNC product manager.
Similar voice command pathways and functionality exist for the Stitcher and OpenBeak apps. With Stitcher, for example, you can say the command, "Play station news" to listen to your favorite news radio or "Play station sports" to hear on-demand sports programming. Other popular Stitcher features such as skip station, thumbs up/down and "Add to favorites" are also available via voice.
Through the OpenBeak app, drivers can simply say the SYNC command, "Read timeline." In seconds, their feed is read aloud using the SYNC text-to-speech engine a very similar experience to listening to talk radio.
Additional SYNC-enabled apps and smartphone integrations are coming soon, said Marchwicki. AppLink will also be introduced on other SYNC-equipped new model vehicles in 2011.
Ford will feature demos of AppLink at the Pepcom Digital Experience media event in Las Vegas on Jan. 5, 2011, and then at the 2011 International CES consumer technology trade show in Las Vegas between Jan. 6 and Jan. 9, 2011.
About Ford Motor Company
Ford Motor Company (NYSE: F), a global automotive industry leader based in Dearborn, Mich., manufactures or distributes automobiles across six continents. With about 163,000 employees and about 70 plants worldwide, the company's automotive brands include Ford, Lincoln and Mercury, production of which has been announced by the company to be ending in the fourth quarter of 2010. The company provides financial services through Ford Motor Credit Company. For more information regarding Ford's products, please visit www.ford.com.
SOURCE Ford Motor Company

description.hltext_display: Escursioni sulla neve nel Parco Nazionale del Gran Paradiso
description.content:
Un’esperienza diversa per chi vuole scoprire le valli del Parco in questa stagione, godendo dei paesaggi intatti, senza cannoni sparaneve o piste illuminate a giorno. Per immergersi completamente in queste sensazioni, sempre più distanti dalla frenesia della nostra realtà quotidiana, il Parco, in collaborazione con i Comuni, Fondation Grand Paradis, le pro-loco e associazioni locali, [...]
Inserito da tuttisostenibili il giorno 22/12/2010 alle 9.20 - Voti: 1 - Commenti: 0
